lines.text: My car! my food! my supplies!... my ass!
You're first.
This is none of your business.
I'm the rapee, I should have something to say.
[pointing]
You're next, and then you. Come on, honey.
Listen, I just can't bring a child into this kind of a world. Maybe later. Huh, Carlos?... Huh?
You know? A good woman is like a steel brush. Think about it.
I say we run them out of town
Give me another chance! Who knows, they may be just around a dog leg from... good citizenship.

[to Coel]
Everything you need to make it here is in that machine. Opportunity. Security. Self respect.
[showing his jacket's back]
One day you may be wearing these insignia. And that's democracy in action.
Father, I have to know, is police brutality really a sin?
Only on Friday.
I'm guilty, father.
For your penance you will demonstrate bicycle safety at the Black Panther convention in Mobile, Alabama.
This is the real God speaking. Will the owner of the dark blue Mustang convertible, license number TUV525, please turn off your parking lights.
Are you now or have you ever been a member of any organization which advocates the violent overthrow of the government of the United States of America?
Yes.
Which one?
The Paul Revere and the Raiders fan club
Well, if we've learned anything from all of this, it's that some of us are just never satisfied.
I thought it was people who eat Army food often end up dead.
Well Jesus, shall we fire up the golden chariot and descend to Earth?
Sure, sure, Pop, but this time you go first.
You should live so long.
